jobDescription: Summary  Candidate will support the ongoing needs of the clients marketing team. An ideal candidate will be able to speak to both technical and non-technical users in clear terms; specifically, during the creation of UNICA campaigns and specialized reports. Job responsibilities will include: Gathering and understand internal client communication requirements and translating into backend technical implementation and documentation.  Designing, developing and executing integrated marketing campaigns involving complex business rules.  Supporting communications in production, troubleshooting campaign and technical issues, making modifications to existing communications.  Mapping new data elements; as well as creating linkages from Enterprise Data Warehouse (EDW) to Unica. Must Have: Strong professional experience with Unica (4 years).  Strong working knowledge of Teradata (database technology).  Ability to write and optimize/performance tune complex SQL queries.  Working knowledge of stored procedures, triggers, functions, packages, UNIX Shell scripting.
